name: Hope Between Concrete Walls
description: The city has been glorified as the most promising place through the history for its 'holy' prosperity. But this is just a mere fairy tales for most of the people. Inside this concrete jungle, people are forced to 'kill each other', structurally, to be the best version of this turmoil world. Inside this kind of discussion, I stare to the sky for a while and took this picture. I see this beautiful blurry moon between concrete walls as a hope that mankind could be better.
